build-type.name: DevOps Perl tools
build-type.description: 25+ DevOps CLI Tools - Kubernetes & Code templates, Log Anonymizer, SQL ReCaser (MySQL, PostgreSQL, AWS Redshift, Snowflake, Apache Drill, Hive, Impala, Cassandra CQL, Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle, Couchbase N1QL, Dockerfiles), Hadoop HDFS & Hive tools, Solr/SolrCloud CLI, Nginx stats & HTTP(S) URL watchers for load-balanced web farms, Linux tools etc.
